metadata.title: Better Call Jon | Tour Manager & Production in Barcelona
metadata.description: Tour Management, stadium production and festival logistics agency in Barcelona. 15 years of experience with Coldplay, Springsteen, Metallica, Primavera Sound and more.
metadata.ogDescription: The solution to all your tour problems. 15 years of experience in Tour Management, stadium production and festival logistics.
metadata.twitterDescription: The solution to all your tour problems. Never problems, only solutions!

hero.headline: The solution to all your tour problems

services.title: Our
services.subtitle: Five pillars of operational excellence covering every aspect of your live production.

tour-manager.title: Tour Manager
tour-manager.description: Comprehensive management of national and international tours. The tour adult who turns chaos into precision.

produccion-estadios.title: Stadium & Arena Production
produccion-estadios.description: Palau Sant Jordi, Estadi Olímpic and more. Large-scale production with international standards.

logistica-festivales.title: Festival Logistics
logistica-festivales.description: Primavera Sound, Sónar, Cruïlla. Coordination of stages, artists, and real-time operations.

merchandising.title: Merchandising
merchandising.description: Complete management of official merchandising: design, production, logistics, and tour sales.

vehiculos.title: Vehicles
vehiculos.description: Own fleet of vehicles for equipment, backline, and technical staff transport.

sections.title: What is a Tour Manager?
sections.content: A Tour Manager is the professional in charge of the comprehensive management of a musical tour. They coordinate all logistical, administrative, and operational aspects to ensure that every show runs without any setbacks.

sections.title: Services we offer
sections.content:
Our team of Tour Managers with more than 15 years of experience handles:

• Tour route planning and coordination
• Budget and finance management
• Coordination with venues and promoters
• Transport and accommodation logistics
• Real-time problem solving
• Communication between artists, technical crew, and promoters

sections.title: Proven experience
sections.content: We have managed national and international tours for top-tier artists, guaranteeing professionalism, efficiency, and peace of mind so that the artists can focus on what they do best: perform.

sections.title: Large Format Production
sections.content: Specialists in the production of events in large-capacity spaces such as the Palau Sant Jordi, Estadi Olímpic, and the main arenas in Spain.

sections.title: Production Services
sections.content:
Our experience in stadiums and arenas includes:

• Full technical coordination
• Management of large-scale sound, lighting, and video equipment
• Coordination of setup and teardown
• Technical crew management
• Coordination with venue and security
• Time and resource planning

sections.title: International Standards
sections.content: We work with the highest industry standards, guaranteeing international-level productions in any large-format venue.

sections.title: Festival Specialists
sections.content: Proven experience in Spain's leading festivals: Primavera Sound, Sónar, Cruïlla, and many more. Coordination of multiple stages, artists, and simultaneous operations.

sections.title: Full Logistical Coordination
sections.content:
Comprehensive festival management including:

• Coordination of multiple stages
• Management of riders and hospitality
• Coordination of transport and transfers
• Backstage and catering management
• Coordination between artists, technicians, and production
• Real-time conflict resolution

sections.title: Real-Time Operations
sections.content: Our team is prepared to manage the complexity of a festival, with multiple artists, fast stage changes, and the necessary coordination for everything to flow perfectly.

sections.title: Tour Merchandising
sections.content: Full management of artists' official merchandising, from the initial concept to tour and online sales.

sections.title: Comprehensive Services
sections.content:
Our merchandising service includes:

• Product design and development
• Production and manufacturing
• Inventory management
• Logistics and transport
• Setup and management of stands in venues
• Sales and staff management
• Reporting and sales analysis

sections.title: Maximize Your Revenue
sections.content: Merchandising is a fundamental source of income during tours. Our expert team ensures maximum profitability with quality products that fans love.

sections.title: Own Fleet
sections.content: We have our own fleet of vehicles adapted for transporting equipment, instruments, backline, and technical staff.

sections.title: Transport Services
sections.content:
Our fleet includes:

• Cargo vans for equipment and backline
• Personnel transport vehicles
• Professional drivers with tour experience
• Comprehensive insurance
• Guaranteed maintenance and cleaning
• 24/7 availability

sections.title: Guaranteed Reliability
sections.content: Our vehicles receive regular maintenance and are prepared for the demands of tours. Reliability when you need it most.

hallOfFame.title: Hall of
hallOfFame.subtitle: 15 years working with the most important artists and festivals on the international scene.

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Tell us the details and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
